title: Add dynamic Tailwind navbar from JSON
description: Create a Tailwind-styled navbar component that renders from JSON data and supports dropdowns for nested items.

comments.author: empire-pa\amathias
comments.text: Fix dropdown alignment by adding flex alignment (lg:items-center on nav list and inline-flex items-center on dropdown button).

title: Fix dropdown nav links
description: Dropdown nav links need to be corrected/fixed in Navbar.astro.
